data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Bizerte, Tunisia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bizerte, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Bizerte an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Bizerte
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 169 believers in Bizerte, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Bizerte, Tunisia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 568,200 people living in the state of Bizerte.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Bizerte to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Bizerte
location.cities_list: Bizerte, Menzel Bourguiba, Mateur, Menzel Jemil, Menzel Abderhaman
location.cities_list_w_pop: Bizerte (115,268), Menzel Bourguiba (54,536), Mateur (31,005), Menzel Jemil (21,542), Menzel Abderhaman (19,078)
